# Auto-generated by tools/generate_building_hooks.py
# IO creation + parent profile lookup + init dispatch

# Create PM international organizations and populate their goods maps,
# then stamp global parent map epbm_profiles (building_type -> IO scope).
# Called once at game start.

epbm_stamp_globals = {
	# destroy_international_organization requires country scope
	random_country = {
		limit = { is_real_country = yes }

		every_in_global_list = {
			variable = epbm_all_ios
			save_temporary_scope_as = io_to_destroy
			prev = { destroy_international_organization = { target = scope:io_to_destroy } }
		}
	}

	clear_global_variable_list = epbm_all_ios
	clear_global_variable_map = epbm_profiles

	# Create all PM IOs and populate goods maps inside creation scope
	random_country = {
		limit = { is_real_country = yes }
		# PM: arts_academy_maintenance (paper 0.6, dyes 0.2, marble 0.2, books 0.4)
		create_international_organization = {
			type = international_organization_type:epbm_pm_arts_academy_maintenance
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:paper value = 0.6 }
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:dyes value = 0.2 }
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:marble value = 0.2 }
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:books value = 0.4 }
		}

			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:clay value = 0.2 }
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:stone value = 0.2 }
		}

		# PM: kontor_maintenance (lumber 0.1, tools 0.1, paper 0.25)
		create_international_organization = {
			type = international_organization_type:epbm_pm_kontor_maintenance
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:lumber value = 0.1 }
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:tools value = 0.1 }
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:paper value = 0.25 }
		}

		# PM: lazaretto_maintenance (fiber_crops 0.15, books 0.05, medicaments 0.03)
		create_international_organization = {
			type = international_organization_type:epbm_pm_lazaretto_maintenance

			add_to_variable_map = {
				name = epbm_goods
				key = goods:fiber_crops
				value = 0.15
			}
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:books value = 0.05 }
			add_to_variable_map = {
				name = epbm_goods
				key = goods:medicaments
				value = 0.03
			}
		}

		# PM: library_maintenance (paper 0.1, books 0.25)

			type = international_organization_type:epbm_pm_library_maintenance
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:paper value = 0.1 }
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:books value = 0.25 }
		}

			type = international_organization_type:epbm_pm_lighthouse_of_alexandria_maintenance

				key = goods:naval_supplies
				value = 0.5
			}
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:tar value = 0.1 }
		}

		# PM: local_smelters_maintenance (tools 0.025, lumber 0.05, coal 0.05)

			type = international_organization_type:epbm_pm_local_smelters_maintenance

			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:coal value = 0.05 }
		}

			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:paper value = 0.1 }
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:cloth value = 0.2 }
		}

			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:pottery value = 0.2 }
		}

			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:salt value = 0.05 }
		}

		}

		}

		}

			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:paper value = 0.1 }

			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:tools value = 0.1 }
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:salt value = 0.1 }
		}

		# PM: wharf_maintenance (tar 0.1, naval_supplies 0.05, tools 0.1, lumber 0.1)
		create_international_organization = {
			type = international_organization_type:epbm_pm_wharf_maintenance
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:tar value = 0.1 }
			add_to_variable_map = {

				key = goods:naval_supplies
				value = 0.05
			}
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:tools value = 0.1 }
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:lumber value = 0.1 }
		}

		# PM: windmill_maintenance (tools 0.025, lumber 0.05, cloth 0.05)
		create_international_organization = {
			type = international_organization_type:epbm_pm_windmill_maintenance
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:tools value = 0.025 }
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:lumber value = 0.05 }
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:cloth value = 0.05 }
		}

		# PM: wissel_bank_maintenance (paper 0.5, goods_gold 0.5, silver 0.5)
		create_international_organization = {
			type = international_organization_type:epbm_pm_wissel_bank_maintenance
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:paper value = 0.5 }
			add_to_variable_map = {
				name = epbm_goods
				key = goods:goods_gold
				value = 0.5
			}
			add_to_variable_map = { name = epbm_goods key = goods:silver value = 0.5 }
		}
	}

	# Parent map: building_type -> IO scope
	add_to_global_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_profiles
		key = building_type:adm_vatican_library
		value = international_organization:epbm_pm_library_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_profiles
		key = building_type:al_azhar_madrasa
		value = international_organization:epbm_pm_library_maintenance
	}

		value = international_organization:epbm_pm_university_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_profiles
		key = building_type:usa_academy_of_arts_and_sciences
		value = international_organization:epbm_pm_usa_academy_of_arts_and_sciences_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_profiles
		key = building_type:usa_national_bank
		value = international_organization:epbm_pm_usa_national_bank_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_profiles
		key = building_type:usa_national_mint
		value = international_organization:epbm_pm_usa_national_mint_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_profiles
		key = building_type:usa_philosophical_society
		value = international_organization:epbm_pm_usa_philosophical_society_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_profiles
		key = building_type:venetian_quarter
		value = international_organization:epbm_pm_venetian_quarter_maintenance
	}  # (foreign)
	add_to_global_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_profiles
		key = building_type:venkateswara_temple
		value = international_organization:epbm_pm_temple_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_profiles
		key = building_type:wali_songo_shrine
		value = international_organization:epbm_pm_monastery_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_profiles
		key = building_type:wat_chaiwatthanaram_temple_building
		value = international_organization:epbm_pm_temple_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_profiles
		key = building_type:wharf
		value = international_organization:epbm_pm_wharf_maintenance
	}  # (trade)
	add_to_global_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_profiles
		key = building_type:windmill
		value = international_organization:epbm_pm_windmill_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_profiles
		key = building_type:wisselbank
		value = international_organization:epbm_pm_wissel_bank_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_map = {
		name = epbm_profiles
		key = building_type:woodhenge_of_cahokia
		value = international_organization:epbm_pm_cahokia_woodhenge_production_method
	}

	# Global list of all PM IOs (for monthly cache clearing)
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_arts_academy_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_bank_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_basic_castle_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_bibliotheca_corviniana_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_black_market_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_bolshoi_theater_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_bridge_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_brothel_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_bubu_building_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_bund_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_cahokia_woodhenge_production_method
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_capital_building_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_caravan_stop_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_caravanserai_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_cathedral_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_college_of_poets_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_colony_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_commerce_center_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios

	}

	}

		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_tax_assessor_requirements
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_temple_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios

	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_theater_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_trade_company_headquarters_requirements
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_trade_office_requirements
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_trans_saharan_trade_outposts_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_tribes_of_galway_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_tur_kodjabashi_office_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_university_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_usa_academy_of_arts_and_sciences_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_usa_national_bank_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_usa_national_mint_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_usa_philosophical_society_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_venetian_quarter_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_warehouse_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_wharf_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_windmill_maintenance
	}
	add_to_global_variable_list = {
		name = epbm_all_ios
		target = international_organization:epbm_pm_wissel_bank_maintenance
	}
}

# Init dispatch: add building instance to location list for pre-existing buildings
# Scope: building (called via every_buildings_in_location)
# Trade buildings go to epbm_trade_types, regular to epbm_building_types.
# Foreign and government buildings are skipped (no location list).

epbm_init_building = {
	save_temporary_scope_as = epbm_bldg
	if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:adm_vatican_library }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:al_azhar_madrasa }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:archive_of_the_indies }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_trade_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:bardic_school }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:bibliotheca_corviniana }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:bolshoi_theater }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:bridge_infrastructure }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:brothel }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:bubu_building }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:bund }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:caravan_stop }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_trade_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:caravanserai }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_trade_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:cathedral }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:charite_of_berlin }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:city_of_victory }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:clearing_house }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_trade_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:college_of_poets }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:commerce_center }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_trade_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:confucian_academy }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:confucian_school }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:constantinople_observatory }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:customs_house }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_trade_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:darussifa }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:debere_meshwae }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:delhi_tomb }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:dip_vatican_library }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:dun_fort }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:entrepot }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_trade_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:fra_louvre_museum }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:fulani_cattle_rearing_pen }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:funduq }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_trade_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:globe_theatre }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:granary }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_building_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { building_type = building_type:grand_marketplace }

		location = {
			add_to_variable_list = { name = epbm_trade_types target = scope:epbm_bldg }
		}
	}
